title: INfinance

items.title: I put my $500K inheritance into a joint account with my husband. Can I leave half of it to my son from a previous marriage?
items.description: “If I predecease my husband, my will states that my son will receive half of this account.”

items.title: My life partner is 18 years my senior. He wants to leave his $4.5 million fortune to me — not his two kids. Do we tell them?
items.description: “No doubt they would feel the arrangement is unfair, and that would potentially end our relationship.”
